description: Selects properties from a publisher's adagents.json. Used for both product definitions and agent authorization. Supports three selection patterns: all properties, specific IDs, or by tags.

oneOf.description: Select all properties from the publisher domain

publisher_domain.description: Domain where publisher's adagents.json is hosted (e.g., 'cnn.com')

selection_type.description: Discriminator indicating all properties from this publisher are included

property_ids.description: Specific property IDs from the publisher's adagents.json

publisher_domain.description: Domain where publisher's adagents.json is hosted (e.g., 'cnn.com')

selection_type.description: Discriminator indicating selection by specific property IDs

property_tags.description: Property tags from the publisher's adagents.json. Selector covers all properties with these tags

publisher_domain.description: Domain where publisher's adagents.json is hosted (e.g., 'cnn.com')

selection_type.description: Discriminator indicating selection by property tags

title: Publisher Property Selector
